column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I got the tonkotsu assari ($10)
column2: which came with thick noodles. I really liked the broth-- it was rich
column4: and flavorful. After a while though
column5: the broth started tasting really salty
column6: to the point where I couldn't taste any other flavors. I normally like chewy noodles
column7: but the thick noodles were TOO thick and chewy
column8: IMO. The chasu (pork belly) and seasoned egg were amazing!
